resource_directory_id.description: The id of the resource folder on the Google Drive. This will be used to output the resulting data with the `push` command.

resource_name.description: The name of the resource on the Google Drive.

resource_id.description: The id of the resource on the Google Drive. When both the name and the id are defined the id will take precedence.

file_name.description: The filename to which the resource should be downloaded.

download_directory.description: The directory in which the resource should be downloaded.
